configuration.query:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url 'jdbc:postgresql://poolpostgrestls.marathon.mesos:5432/postgres?prepareThreshold=0',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '(select * from motortown.aurgicsvrows where entity=\'motortown_productos_y_servicios.csv\') tmp'
)

configuration.sql:
select *,Precio as pvp, Precio as pvp_promocionado,
 case 
 when Atributo03 in ('MOTORTOWN','AURGI') then 1
 when Atributo03='1PR' then 3
 else 2 
 end as orden_alfabetico
  from Csv

select substr(content, 0, length(content)-1)  as content from MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS
 where processts = 
 	(select max (processts) from MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS)

select *,
case
when Atributo05 = 'I' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', 'Invierno')
when Atributo05 = 'T' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', '4 Estaciones')
else
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ')
end as titulo_temp,
case
when Atributo05 = 'I' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16, 'Invierno')
when Atributo05 = 'T' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16, '4 Estaciones')
else
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16)
end as codigo_temp
 from ProductosOrden

select *,
case
when Atributo15 = 'R' then
concat(titulo_temp, ' ', Atributo15)
else
titulo_temp
end as titulo_neumatico_matricula,
case
when Atributo15 = 'R' then
concat(codigo_temp, ' ', Atributo15)
else
codigo_temp
end as codigo_neumatico_matricula,
case
when Atributo15='R' then 'yes'
else 'no'
end as runflat_text
from ProductosTemporalidad

select CodInterno, EAN, Matricula, DescripcionAlias,Descripcion02,Categoria
	,Atributo03,Atributo04
	,linkImgL,linkImgM,linkImgS
	,ServiciosObligatorios,ServiciosOpcionales
	,ActivoExterno,Precio
	,orden_alfabetico,titulo_neumatico_matricula,codigo_neumatico_matricula
 ,concat (
 regexp_replace('activoexterno=0,','0', ActivoExterno)
 ,'cai=103293,'
 ,'color=red,'
 ,regexp_replace('diameter=16,','16',Atributo06)
 ,regexp_replace('ean=3528707773869,','3528707773869',EAN)
 ,regexp_replace('height=55,','55',Atributo08)
 ,'homologation=,'
 ,'is_matricula=Yes,'
 ,'label_icon_1=C,'
 ,'label_icon_2=A,'
 ,'label_icon_3=1,'
 ,'label_icon_4=68,'
 ,regexp_replace('load_index=94,','94',Atributo10)
 ,regexp_replace('manufacturer=micheline,','micheline',Atributo03) 
 ,regexp_replace('matricula=TEST,','TEST',Matricula)
 ,'on_hover=png,'
 ,regexp_replace('runflat=no,','no',runflat_text)
 ,regexp_replace('season=I,','I',Atributo05)
 ,regexp_replace('speed_index=H,','H','H')
 ,'tyre_group=Marca líder,'
 ,regexp_replace('tyre_model=TESTMODELO,','TESTMODELO',Atributo04)
 ,'tyre_store=Motortown,'
 ,regexp_replace('vehicle_type=turismo,','turismo',GrupoProducto) /*revisar posibles valores*/
 ,regexp_replace('width=205','205',Atributo07)
 ) as  additional_attributes 
from ProductosCalc
 where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

Select 
concat('"', coalesce(CodInterno,''), '"') as  sku ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  store_view_code,
concat('"', coalesce('Neumaticos',''), '"') as  attribute_set_code ,
concat('"', coalesce('simple',''), '"') as  product_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('Default Category/Neumáticos',''), '"') as  categories ,
concat('"', coalesce('base',''), '"') as  product_websites ,
concat('"', coalesce(concat(Atributo03,' ', Atributo04) ,''), '"') as  name ,
concat('"', coalesce(titulo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  description ,
concat('"', coalesce(codigo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  short_description ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  weight ,
concat('"', coalesce('1',''), '"') as  product_online ,
concat('"', coalesce('Taxable Goods',''), '"') as  tax_class_name ,
concat('"', coalesce('Catalog, Search',''), '"') as  visibility ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  price,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price_from_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price_to_date ,
concat('"', coalesce(CodInterno,''), '"') as  url_key ,
concat('"', coalesce(titulo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  meta_title ,
concat('"', coalesce(codigo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  meta_keywords ,
concat('"', coalesce(codigo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  meta_description ,
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgL,''), '"') as  base_image , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgL,''), '"') as  base_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgM,''), '"') as  small_image , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgM,''), '"') as  small_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgS,''), '"') as  thumbnail_image , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgS,''), '"') as  thumbnail_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgS,''), '"') as  swatch_image , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgS,''), '"') as  swatch_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  created_at ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  updated_at ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  new_from_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  new_to_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  display_product_options_in ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  map_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  msrp_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  map_enabled ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  gift_message_available ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design_from ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design_to ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_layout_update ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  page_layout ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  product_options_container ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  msrp_display_actual_price_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  country_of_manufacture ,
concat('"', coalesce(additional_attributes,''), '"') as  additional_attributes ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  out_of_stock_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_min_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  is_qty_decimal ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  allow_backorders ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_backorders ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  min_cart_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_min_sale_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  max_cart_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_max_sale_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  is_in_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  notify_on_stock_below ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_notify_stock_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  manage_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_manage_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  use_config_enable_qty_inc ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  enable_qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  is_decimal_divided ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  website_id ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  related_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  related_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  crosssell_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  crosssell_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  upsell_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  upsell_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  additional_images ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  additional_image_labels ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  hide_from_product_page ,
concat('"', coalesce(custom_options,''), '"') as  custom_options ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_price_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_sku_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_price_view ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_weight_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_values ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_shipment_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  configurable_variations ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  configurable_variation_labels ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  associated_skus 
from AttributesAndOptions

select concat_ws
(',',
sku ,
store_view_code ,
attribute_set_code,
product_type ,
categories ,
product_websites ,
name ,
description ,
short_description ,
weight ,

special_price_to_date ,

base_image_label ,

small_image_label ,
thumbnail_image ,
thumbnail_image_label ,
swatch_image ,
swatch_image_label ,
created_at ,
updated_at ,
new_from_date ,
new_to_date ,
display_product_options_in ,
map_price ,
msrp_price ,
map_enabled ,
gift_message_available ,
custom_design ,
custom_design_from ,
custom_design_to ,
custom_layout_update ,
page_layout ,
product_options_container ,
msrp_display_actual_price_type ,
country_of_manufacture ,
additional_attributes ,
qty ,
out_of_stock_qty ,
use_config_min_qty ,
is_qty_decimal ,
allow_backorders ,
use_config_backorders ,
min_cart_qty ,
use_config_min_sale_qty ,
max_cart_qty ,
use_config_max_sale_qty ,
is_in_stock ,
notify_on_stock_below ,
use_config_notify_stock_qty ,
manage_stock ,
use_config_manage_stock ,
use_config_qty_increments ,
qty_increments ,
use_config_enable_qty_inc ,
enable_qty_increments ,
is_decimal_divided ,
website_id ,
related_skus ,
related_position ,
crosssell_skus ,
crosssell_position ,
upsell_skus ,
upsell_position ,
additional_images ,
additional_image_labels ,
hide_from_product_page ,
custom_options ,
bundle_price_type ,
bundle_sku_type ,
bundle_price_view ,
bundle_weight_type ,
bundle_values ,
bundle_shipment_type ,
configurable_variations ,
configurable_variation_labels ,
associated_skus 
 ) as csv, current_timestamp as processts
 from 
 ProductsFields

select csv,processts from MagentoCsvProducts
where csv not in
(select csv from MOTORTOWN.AURGIPRODUCTSEXPORTED)

configuration.query:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.AURGIPRODUCTSEXPORTED
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url 'jdbc:postgresql://poolpostgrestls.marathon.mesos:5432/postgres?prepareThreshold=0',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '(select csv from motortown.magentoproductshistory where processts = (select max(processts) from motortown.magentoproductshistory)) tmp'
)

configuration.sql:
select EAN,explode(split(ServiciosObligatorios,",")) as product_services
 from Csv 
 where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

select EAN,explode(split(ServiciosOpcionales,",")) as product_services
 from Csv 
 where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

select CodInterno,EAN ,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05,
 'name=Servicios Obligatorios,type=multiple,required=1,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje' as cadena
 from DistinctServices
 where Categoria='SERVICIOS'

select CodInterno,EAN,DescripcionAlias,Precio, Atributo05,
regexp_replace(	
	regexp_replace(
		regexp_replace(cadena,'montaje',CodInterno) 
		,'Montaje',concat(DescripcionAlias,' - Tiempo: ', Atributo05))
		,'8.0000',Precio) as custom_options
from Services

select  a.EAN, b.custom_options from ProductServices a
join ServicesRegexp b
 on a.product_services=b.CodInterno

select CodInterno,EAN ,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05,
 'name=Servicios Opcionales,type=multiple,required=0,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje' as cadena
 from DistinctServices
 where Categoria='SERVICIOS'

select CodInterno,EAN,DescripcionAlias,Precio, Atributo05,
regexp_replace(	
	regexp_replace(
		regexp_replace(cadena,'montaje',CodInterno) 
		,'Montaje',concat(DescripcionAlias,' - Tiempo: ', Atributo05))
		,'8.0000',Precio) as custom_options
from ServicesOpcionales

select  a.EAN, b.custom_options from ProductServicesOpcionales a
join ServicesOpcionalesRegexp b
 on a.product_services=b.CodInterno

select EAN, concat_ws("|",collect_list(custom_options)) as custom_options 
from UnionServices 
  group by EAN

select 
a.CodInterno, a.EAN, a.Matricula, a.DescripcionAlias, a.Descripcion02, a.Categoria
	,a.Atributo03,a.Atributo04
	,a.linkImgL,a.linkImgM,a.linkImgS
	,a.ServiciosObligatorios,a.ServiciosOpcionales
	,a.ActivoExterno,a.Precio
	,a.orden_alfabetico,a.titulo_neumatico_matricula,a.codigo_neumatico_matricula
 , a.additional_attributes , b.custom_options
 from Attributes a 
 join CustomOptions b 
  on a.EAN=b.EAN
